kw.name: Connect To Database Using Custom Params
kw.doc: Loads the DB API 2.0 module given `dbapiModuleName` then uses it to connect to the database using the map string `db_custom_param_string`.

kw.name: Execute Sql Script
kw.doc: Executes the content of the `sqlScriptFileName` as SQL commands. Useful for setting the database to a known state before running your tests, or clearing out your test data after running each a test. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback.

kw.name: Connect To Database Using Custom Params
kw.doc: Loads the DB API 2.0 module given `dbapiModuleName` then uses it to connect to the database using the map string `db_custom_param_string`.
kw.msg: Executing : Connect To Database Using Custom Params : pymysql.connect(db_api_2.connect(database='microblog_test', user='root', password='password', host='localhost', port=3306))

kw.name: Execute Sql Script
kw.doc: Executes the content of the `sqlScriptFileName` as SQL commands. Useful for setting the database to a known state before running your tests, or clearing out your test data after running each a test. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback.

kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Connect To Database Using Custom Params
kw.doc: Loads the DB API 2.0 module given `dbapiModuleName` then uses it to connect to the database using the map string `db_custom_param_string`.
kw.msg: Executing : Connect To Database Using Custom Params : pymysql.connect(db_api_2.connect(database='microblog_test', user='root', password='password', host='localhost', port=3306))

kw.name: Execute Sql Script
kw.doc: Executes the content of the `sqlScriptFileName` as SQL commands. Useful for setting the database to a known state before running your tests, or clearing out your test data after running each a test. Set optional input `sansTran` to True to run command without an explicit transaction commit or rollback.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
